00005 #include <stdarg.h>

00009 extern SCREEN _cursvar;

00011 /*#+func-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00012     FUNCTION: wn_debug()
00013      PURPOSE: send debug information to debug window
00014       SYNTAX: int wn_debug(WINDOWPTR w, char *format, ...);
00015  DESCRIPTION:
00016      RETURNS: NO_WINDOW: window not opened
00017               TRUE     : all ok
00018      HISTORY: 21-Nov-1992 21:43:43 V
00019 --#-func----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00020 int wn_debug(char *format, ...)
00021 {
00022   va_list arguments;
00023   static int first_time = TRUE;
00024   static WINDOW *debug_window;
00025   int old_mon;
00026   char s[132];
00027 
00028   /*---------------------------
00029     Switch to second monitor
00030   ---------------------------*/
00031   old_mon = monitor;
00032   wn_monitor(MONITOR_2);
00033 
00034   if (first_time) {
00035     debug_window = wn_open(_DOUBLE_LINE,0,0,_cursvar.cols,_cursvar.lines,
00036                    16*BLACK+WHITE,16*BLACK+WHITE);
00037     if (!debug_window)
00038       exit(-1);
00039     wn_title(debug_window,"DEBUG OUTPUT");
00040     first_time = FALSE;
00041   }
00042 
00043   /*----------------------------
00044     Make this the active window
00045   ------------------------------*/
00046   /*
00047   if (debug_window != top_window)
00048     wn_top(debug_window);
00049   */
00050 
00051   /*-----------------------
00052     Build and print string
00053   ------------------------*/
00054   va_start(arguments,format);
00055   vsprintf(s,format,arguments);
00056   va_end(arguments);
00057   wn_printf(debug_window,"%s",s);
00058 
00059   /*-----------------------------
00060     Switch to original monitor
00061   -----------------------------*/
00062   wn_monitor(old_mon);
00063 
00064   return(TRUE);
00065 }
